com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig

Class ConfigManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig.ConfigManager

  • public class ConfigManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Registry where we keep the mod config panel classes and config file writers
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

      Instance a new config panel for the specified mod class if one is available.

      Check whether a config panel is available for the specified class

      Initialise the config writer for the specified mod
      void invalidateConfig(Exposable exposable)
      Invalidate the specified mod config, cause it to be written to disk or scheduled for writing if it has been written recently.
      void migrateModConfig(LiteMod mod, java.io.File newConfigPath, java.io.File oldConfigPath)
      If the specified mod has a versioned config strategy, attempt to copy the config.
      void onTick()
      Tick all of the configuration writers, handles latent writes for anti-hammer strategy.

      Register a mod, adds the config panel class to the map if the mod implements Configurable
      void syncConfig()
      Force all mod configs to be flushed to disk
